flawed_nl_solution:
Her hair was 24" long and she cut half off so she cut 24/2 = <<24/2=12>>12 inches
Her hair was 24" long and she cut 12" off so she has 24-12 = <<24-12=21>>21 inches left
She has 21" of hair and lets it grow 4 more inches for a total of 21+4 = <<21+4=25>>25 inches
She has 25" and cuts off 2 more inches which leaves her hair 25-2 = <<25-2=23>>23 inches long
#### 23

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
